name: Estela Radan
review: Joao gave me a wonderful haircut. He listened to what I wanted and offered his take and then gave me a great cut! Claudia shampooed my hair and it was so relaxing. Great experience and I will be back!

name: John Doe
review: I had an amazing experience at Tresses Salon DC. The staff was friendly and professional. The haircut I received was exactly what I wanted. Highly recommend!

name: Jane Smith
review: Fantastic service! The stylists are skilled and attentive. I was very happy with my haircut and will definitely be returning for future appointments.
